thread.title: BRIEF-Ellomay Capital Enters Into Binding Term Sheet For A Power Financial Hedge For Talasol Project

title: BRIEF-Ellomay Capital Enters Into Binding Term Sheet For A Power Financial Hedge For Talasol Project

organizations.name: power financial hedge for talasol project reuters staff

text:
January 24, 2018 / 2:08 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Ellomay Capital Enters Into Binding Term Sheet For A Power Financial Hedge For Talasol Project Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Ellomay Capital Ltd: 
* ELLOMAY CAPITAL ENTERS INTO A BINDING TERM SHEET FOR A POWER FINANCIAL HEDGE FOR THE TALASOL PROJECT 
* ELLOMAY CAPITAL LTD - POWER PRODUCED BY TALASOL PROJECT IS EXPECTED TO BE SOLD BY TALASOL TO OPEN MARKET FOR THEN CURRENT MARKET POWER PRICE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
